item.title: New Developments in Trump’s Attempt to Fire a Fed Board Member
item.description: It’s likely that Lisa Cook will prevail in the short term, for three reasons.

item.title: Welfare Can’t Win the War on Poverty
item.description: Universal basic income is neither novel nor effective.

item.title: Public Schools Are Trampling Religious Liberty and Failing Our Kids
item.description: We must change laws and policies, but more importantly, we must change hearts and minds.

item.title: MSNBC’s Shameful Breaking News Coverage on Charlie Kirk
item.description: The subsequent removal of one pundit does not make things right.

item.title: The Western Canon Can Help Us Resist the Totalitarian Temptation
item.description: C. S. Lewis offered a moral and intellectual antidote to the totalitarian temptation: a return to ancient truths to help defeat the lies of his own da...
